articles.title: Android 15 improves standby battery life by up to 3 hours on some devices - Android Authority
articles.description: Google says they’ve sped up how fast phones enter doze mode by 50% in Android 15. The result is improved standby battery life.
articles.content:
• Google says theyve sped up how fast phones enter doze mode by 50% in Android 15.
  • The result is that some devices are seeing up to 3 hours longer standby power on the latest OS.

articles.author: Meredith Garofalo
articles.title: Massive sunspot that brought widespread auroras to Earth now targets Mars - Space.com
articles.description: After quite the aurora experience across Earth this past weekend, beastly sunspot AR3664 could give Mars quite the same solar spectacular.
articles.content:
Yes, the beastly sunspot AR3664 is in the news again.
Although the sunspot has rotated out of our view, it's still quite the hotspot, having fired off its strongest solar flare yet on Tuesday (May 1… [+3295 chars]

articles.title: Climate Change Threatens Brain Health - Neuroscience News
articles.description: Extreme temperatures, poor sleep due to warmer nights, and adverse weather events can worsen neurological and psychiatric disorders, increasing hospitalizations and mortality.
articles.content: Summary: Climate change poses a significant threat to individuals with brain conditions. Extreme temperatures, poor sleep due to warmer nights, and adverse weather events can worsen neurological and … [+6841 chars]
